content:
Yes, the Legacy Arena Renovation Project is expected to be completed in 2022. The project began in April 2019, and since then, construction crews have been working to modernize and expand the arena's seating capacity, as well as introduce new amenities such as luxury suites, event spaces, and a new scoreboard. 

The renovation of the Legacy Arena is a significant project for the city, as it is expected to improve the venue's ability to attract high-profile events and sports tournaments, generating significant economic benefits for the city.

In addition to the renovation itself, the project is also creating job opportunities for workers in the construction industry. It is expected to create around 1,200 jobs during the construction phase, which will significantly benefit the local economy.

Overall, the Legacy Arena Renovation Project is an exciting development for Birmingham that will modernize and expand this iconic venue, contributing to the city's economy and cultural landscape.
